fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Secretly give somebody a lifetime supply of apples at night, preventing them from being able to be protected for the rest of the game.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Once all roles that can give protection are dead, transform into a random Mafia Support role.
- Protections fail on you. If two protective abilities target you in the same night, you lose your ability, and the lifetime apples go away (You still keep your first attribute)
- __**Part of the Daily Streak Faction**__

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Kill all who oppose the Mafia.
